thread.section_title: Walker Hotel Greenwich Village - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Like a gem!
thread.title_full: Like a gem! - Review of Walker Hotel Greenwich Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NewWaterloo
title: Like a gem!
text:
My 1st stay won't be my last. The hotel was stylish and had everything I needed. Decor was amazing- very cozy. The best part was the incredibly friendly, helpful staff. Every person I had contact with was welcoming. Air and Nancy did an exceptional job.
Room Tip: Air conditioner fan was a bit loud. It was the only "even better if..." See more room tips
